answers.answer: Im 29 weeks with my first and its a little boy I feel good besides him having alot of amniotic fluid around him everything with him is good hes a very active little thing and im die march 12 but I think hes gonna come sooner then that but anyways ill be ready I cant wait to hold him and sing to him

Doctor gave my little boy am eviction notice, get out on your own by March 2nd or we're inducing!! So excited, braxton hicks and back pain are my new normal... I'm going to start trying to self induce after valentines day, he's going to be a big boy!!!

I'm having my second boy due March 12th. I feel like I look 9 months preg already! Feeling well except lower back pain from overdoing yesterday. I will be induced @ 39 weeks unless he comes sooner because I have a narrow pelvis :/

29 weeks due Mar 13. Feeling pretty tired all the time and a bit slow and cumbersome. Some BH but nothing major. Feeling a little pent up like I wish I could just go work out hard or have a glass of wine or something.  Heartburn all the time. Trying to buy a house so no nesting or baby buying allowed which is frustrating and gives me a little anxiety about being prepared. But its all good no big complaints just small ones.
Due March 6th with baby girl #3 can't wait for this, to be over lol
Due March 3rd can't wait!  Second boy :)

My csections scheduled for march 16th I can't wait to meet my little girl. I've been having a lot of lower back and pelvis cramping. I get a lot of braxton hicks feeling a but over crowded in there. I can't wait till tomorrow I get to go see her we get an ultrasound tomorrow cuz they didn't get to see her face and heart last time so I'm so excited to get to see her.

Due March 4 th with my second child my first is 8 so this seems so new to me.. I have horrible back pain and for the past couple weeks my butt has been hurting!? But I'm ready for him to come I'm very excited to meet my baby boy

I'm hanging in there. We're on weekly ultrasounds and monthly high risk visits(since the high risk is a 2 hour drive) for baby's kidneys. We're just trying to keep him in as long as we can and trying to stay positive. I'm feeling more round ligament pain this time, and am trying not to catch the flu from my husband but otherwise ok. Glad to hear everyone else is doing well :-)
Due March 28 with my first it's a girl a little tired but other wise ready to go back to work n work out  can't wait

Congratulations Mamas! @Mommypearl26 I also have an 8 year old so this seems like my first time all over again! I'm loving it tho! I'm thinking she will be an early baby because I was diagnosed with GD and with my first pregnancy I had preeclampsia. I'm hoping she stays in as long as she's able to tho.

Omg my little boy is turning 9 in January so I totally get the first time feeling as well, too funny... Really thought I was the only one with that age gap!!! Christmas, birthday, baby shower and then baby... Time is flying by!!!
I'm due March 21. Some days I feel him move a lot and other days not as much.. anyone experience this?

I am due March 25 with my first little girl. Had a scare with preterm labor yesterday. Very minor got it to stop and heading to the high risk dr. With the exception of some hip pain and occasional insomnia (like now)  i am doing ok. Trying to enjoy the kicks and baby movement as much as possible while i can.  But i am ready to meet my little girl. Time will fly i think. I have all of 2 free weekends between now and March 21 which is just a few days before her dd

I'm due march 23rd & I can't wait until my due date comes! I'm sooooo tired all the time, my back hurts my stomach feels like it weighs a ton! The doc said tht he's a little big, but other then that he's doing great! Get to check up on him again Tuesday morn!!!! :)
I'm due March 19th with a boy. Feeling a bit tired now and can't wait to meet him soon!

My due date is Jan 20 im 36 weeks and its a boy, I have 2 girls (9 and 8) and we cant wait to hold him in our arms. I was diagnosed with Gd but ultrasound looks good with weight, not too small not too big. Having my daughters has been a true blessing and sharing this pregnancy with them, I just couldn't be happier. And my husband cant wait to meet his little buddy!

Hi ladies.. im due March 21st 28weeks with my first girl...I have 2 boys...I have alot of back pain and have only gained about 8 pounds...but my baby is growing normal...I worry cuz sometimes I don't feel her move much...every time iv had ultrasound she is fine so I think my baby just sleeps alot... I'm a bit frustrated cuz my doc hasn't scheduled my c section. Hopefully soon...lol...best wishes to all you mommies!!!
I'm due march 6 with my 4th girl I'm 30 weeks along... Having trouble sleeping at night and have hip and rib pain!
Im due march 6 and getting bh really tired n very sore... im pregnant with my third pregnancy and all girls...sad to say this is my last im cutting n tieing...just reLly sore
I will be having a c-section at 39 weeks. My due date was March 8th. Not long to go 8 weeks 6 days left (62 days). I'm so ready to meet my little boy.
I'm 29 weeks 4 days baby #4 and it's a girl♡ :)
Baby boy,fur March 2nd. I get bad upper back pain just beneath my shoulder blade. It hurts so bad that I can't sleep or do Snyder house works.....other than that I feel okay

I am 27 was due 30th of March..... Generally feeling great a bit of back pain and tired at the end of the day....  I am FTM  excited..... Next week I am going for my first antenatal class :) good luck march mums!!!
I meant 27 weeks :)

Im due March 25 with my 3rd child. My last two i went into labor early, i was just diagnosed with gestational diabetes which ive never had. Not liking that so much but other than that everything is going great with this pregnancy, still working my 12 hour shifts. Kinda anxious for him to be here lol..

I'm supposed to be April 2, but my ultrasound said March 28th , two boys on the way here!  I must say I feel great, all the time lol!  FTM with twins,  think I'm blessed because this pregnancy has been a breeze so far,  nothing serious. Little hip pain here and there when I sit too long, and lots of pressure on my pelvis; usually after sex, which I haven't stopped. Not unless the DOC tells me so. But Xaylen and Xander are my joy can't wait to meet them.

Due march 6th with my 4th and last pregnancy. First boy.. lol. But will have csection at about 38 or 39 weeks.. i feel really good other than back pain when i sit or lay down for to long. I cant wait for Logan James to finally be here.
I'm due March 8th. have back pain and had one bout of pre term labor. Currently doing well besides this cold going around. Good luck mommies

I'm due March 2nd with my first! A little girl named Savannah. I'm feeling excited most of all but closely followed by sore ribs. She won't keep her toes out of them. Been having legs cramps at night as well, some of the worst charlie horses I've ever had. But again, so excited to see her beautiful face in 9 weeks!
Im due march 6th with my first baby having a boy, getting uncomfy now cant sleep with rib an hip pain
I'm 28 weeks. Due March 18th with my 4th boy. I'm too excited.  Ready for it to be over. Been experiencing lots of Braxton Hicks, lower back pain, & fatique
Congratulations all March Mommys and good luck in all of your deliveries!!!

Hey mama's to be. I'm due March 9th with my lil prince. I'm a ftm so all of this is new to me. I'm beyond over the moon excited to meet him. I been feeling ok besides the lower back pain random sharp pains and my laziness at an all time high. Congrats to everyone and gid bless. Happy new year
Hi! Due March 16th with our first! STILL don't know what we are having, finding out at our gender reveal/baby shower (Mil is only one who knows) can't wait! !!! Feeling tired and slight back pain.

Hello ladies! I'm a ftm having a beautiful baby girl March 31. It's going well. My boyfriend and I just started having sex again so I'm happy. I don't know what to expect. All I do is read articles about it online. I just want to have an idea on what to expect. I'm a little nervous. But overall I feel fine besides being extremely hungry all the time. I miss working out. Lol. Good luck to everyone! Happy New Year

I'm due March 28th with a baby boy. This is my first and I'm super excited. People are just now beginning to ask me if I'm expecting. So far things have been really good, I feel so blessed but can not wait to meet my little boy

Due March 9th and not finding out sex-so hard buy we are almost there!  This pregnancy has been rough for my first time, horrible back pain where I can barely stand some times to do the dishes! All I do is lay on heating pad and go to the bathroom most days!  So ready for it to be over, but all the pain and discomfort worth it!  Good luck and congrats to everyone:)

question: How are you ladies feeling? When are you do and what are you having?! I'm 29 weeks with my second little girl due March 15th! I'm feeling pretty good but having some BH contractions and really tired!
title: March Mommies!
